title: Last Dance
description: What do you do when the depraved lifestyle of you and your seven sons is threatened by the persistent nuisance of a pain in the ass cop? You take him down, right? Wrong! You want him and his cosy family to suffer. You want souvenirs for your grisly collection. So you take time to plan the ultimate mind-f***. *** Advisory – 10,000 words of the most horrifying kind – once you get started you won’t be able to look away. You have been warned!
author: James Crow
